Package mansfield.edu.wwhitcomb13.maze

Interface Summary
MazeBoardInterface MVC Model: interface defining methods all board generators will have.
 

Class Summary
AController MVC Controller: receives a handle to the View and controls everything that happens as the program runs.
AView MVC View: sets up a GUI view for the application.
ControlPanel MVC View: displays a panel containing various controls allowing the player to control the look and feel of the game.
DrawingPanel MVC View: displays a panel that draws the board, player and robot.
MazeApp Starting point for a simple evade and catch game for young children.
MazeBoard MVC Model: generates a obstacle board as a 2D array of chars.
MazeBoardFiles MVC Model: generates a list of board file names.
MazeBoardTest  
MazeCircle MVC Model: represents a circle icon.
MazeCircleTest  
MazeKitten MVC Model: represents a player icon as a kitty image.
MazeMidi MVC Model: plays a midi music file given a filename.
MazeMidiFiles MVC Model: retrieves a midi music filename.
MazePuppy MVC Model: represents a player icon as a puppy image.
MazeRobot MVC Model: represents a robot player that wanders through the maze.
MazeShape MVC Model: abstract class for player shape and image icons.
MazeSound MVC Model: sets up and plays short sound clips.
MazeTriangle MVC Model: represents a triangle icon.
